ryx

The goal of ryx is to provide functions that test correlations between numeric variables.

Installation

You can install the development version of ryx from GitHub with:

remotes::install_github("https://github.com/chenning2011/ryx")

To learn more about how to use ryx, see the Documentation and Getting Started pages on this site.
